Description.Text: La Gioconda Boutique Hotel is a modern 4-star superior property offering stylish accommodation near the heart of Odessa. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and parking, excellent leisure facilities, onsite dining and a good location near the beach and city centre. Odessa is a popular seaside resort famous for its cultural traditions, beautiful architecture and attractive beaches. Nearby places of interest include Derybasovska Street, the Opera and Ballet Theater, Duke Richelieu Monument and the Potemkin stairs. Odessa train station is located in the vicinity providing fast and easy access to other popular Odessa destinations. The hotel occupies a contemporary property with a relaxing garden styled after a Tuscan villa. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are individually decorated in a traditional style with elegant furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature bathrobes and slippers. The hotel restaurant serves a range of dishes and drinks. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Free parking is possible onsite.
